channel.title: New version of DirectPHP - support for PHP 7
channel.description: Discuss New version of DirectPHP - support for PHP 7

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi Björn, Thanks for your support over so many years! I'm not running php 7.1, and I do not currently have a server running php 7.1. So no way for me to test this now. Will need to find some time to set up a server to test it. > I get no error message, it just does show nothing. Can you try turn on php error_display to see what's the error message? Warm Regards, /CK
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: Björn says:
item.description: Hi, thanks for this very good and usefull plugin. It always worked well for me but when I go to version 7.1 it seems it's not able any more to connect to the Joomla database. With php 7.0 it still works ... do you have an idea? I get no error message, it just does show nothing. Thanks and regards, Björn
item.dc:creator: Björn

item.title: Jim Holloman says:
item.description: The download link for DirectPHP is not correct. I.E. Download here: ==> DirectPHP v3.01
item.dc:creator: Jim Holloman
